definition: rouge and powder/(fig.) the fair sex
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: A red powder was also used on the cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 红粉也经常用来擦脸蛋。

sentences.english: I'm not sure Pretty in Pink is very interesting to boys.
sentences.chinese: 我不确定《红粉佳人》对他们来说是有趣的。

sentences.english: Finally, they let loose hundreds of red flour beetles .
sentences.chinese: 最后，他们将数百只红粉甲虫放出来。

sentences.english: You might try Pink Lady, It's very delicious.
sentences.chinese: 您可以尝尝红粉佳人，它非常可口。

sentences.english: She really loves him and is the first soul mate he has ever had.
sentences.chinese: 她还是真爱他的，是他生平第一个红粉知己。

sentences.english: The New York Times bestselling author of Pretty in Plaid gets her culture on.
sentences.chinese: 纽约时报畅销书的作者格子红粉得到她的文化上。

sentences.english: Phil hates mainstream music, so he doesn't know who Pink is.
sentences.chinese: 菲尔讨厌主流音乐，所以他不知道红粉佳人是谁。

sentences.english: Hey soul sister, I don't want to miss a single thing you do.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，我的红粉知己，我不想错过妳做的每一件事。

definition: face powder and eyebrow liner/cosmetics/(fig.) beautiful woman
romance/beautiful scenery/small or petty (of talk etc)
(of a woman, a flower etc) delicate colors
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
